p: As a simple method, juice leakages from fresh-cut pineapples [ 158], garlic bulbs [ 199], ber fruits [ 165], blueberries [ 194], fresh-cut watermelon [ 110], apples [ 107], plums [ 91], kilka fish [ 214], kashar cheese [ 136], low-fat cut cheese [ 138], ground beef patties [ 149] were significantly reduced with the alginate coating application in moisture loss (or weight loss) experiments conducted very often in studies of alginate coated food products.
